item.description:
We'll be meeting in Portland again this October, but moving to the *2nd Tuesday* of the month.

AGENDA:
Daylight permitting, we'll take a look at Susannah & Francesco's place and talk about what they've done and their plans for the future [NOTE: OPTIONAL ARRIVAL TIME IS 6PM FOR THOSE THAT WANT TO LOOK AROUND IN THE YARD FIRST...]

Followed by a potluck (bring a dish or beverage to share) and more discussion about their "wish list" for the property, how permaculture principles can be of help, and any "problem areas" they'd like the group to brainstorm on...

Note #1: See the "POLLS" area of this web site to weigh in on some potential winter meetup topics.
Note #2: Depending on Susannah & Francesco's schedule on Tuesday, perhaps we can move this to 6:00 start time for those who would like to get more of a look around outside before dark (then back to 6:30 for future meetups...). Please check this site again on Sun/Mon in case *we do* change to a 6:00 start time....

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: The Portland Maine Permaculture October Meetup
